resultDefinitions.resultWording: Disqualified for holding or obtaining a driving licence. Disqualification obligatory for the offence. Driving record endorsed. Section 34(1) Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988

resultDefinitions.resultTextTemplate: Disqualified for holding or obtaining a driving licence for {disqualificationPeriod}.[ %INTD%] Disqualification obligatory for the offence. Driving record endorsed. Section 34(1) Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.[ This includes an extension period of {extensionPeriodSection35AImmediateCustodialSentence} in accordance with section 35A (immediate custodial sentence).][ This includes an extension period of {extensionPeriodSection35BEffectOfCustodialSentenceNoted} in accordance with section 35B (effect of custodial sentence noted).]
